He was originally from the middle of the barrier.
He was a straightforward man with a record of moral discipline.

source_sentence: 入嵩高山事浮圖蜜為師。
translation: He entered Songgaoshan Mountain and served Fotoumi as his teacher.

source_sentence: 晉康帝建元元年至襄陽止羊叔子寺。
translation: In the first year of Emperor Kang's reign in Jin, he went to Xiangyang and stayed at Yangshuzi Temple.
He didn't accept other requests, and whenever he begged for food, he would bring a rope bed with him.

source_sentence: 輒齎繩床自隨於閑曠之路。
translation: He would bring a rope bed and bring it along with him on a quiet road.
He then gave it to them and sat down.
Sometimes when it rained, he covered himself with an oil cape.
When the rain stopped, all he could see was the rope-bottomed bed.
He doesn't know where Wisdom is.
Before the rain stopped, he only saw the rope-bottomed bed.
He always told his disciple Fazhao.
'When you were gone, break a chicken's leg.
Evil will find it.
Soon afterward, Zhao was thrown by someone.
His foot then became permanently ill.
Later, he said to his disciples.
"There's an old man in Sinno who's going to die.
I want to save him.
He was still walking along the edge of a border.
He saw a man plowing his field with oxen.
Hui begged the ox from the gentleman.
The man wouldn't give it to him.
Hui then went ahead and grabbed the ox by its nose.
The gentleman was afraid it would be different.
He then offered it to him.
Hui took the ox and vowed for its return.
He took seven steps and returned the ox to the gong with it.
The duke died in a few days.
Later, he conquered the western region, and Yu Zhigong took Xiangyang.
He had never been a follower of the Dharma.
He heard about Hui's extraordinary achievements.
He was very jealous of him.
Hui told his disciples.
'My former opponent has arrived.'
I admonished my retinue to cultivate goodness and merit.
Two days after that, he was really taken in and sentenced.
He was fifty-eight years old.
When he was about to die, he said to the crowd.
"Three days after I die, the sky will rain heavily.

source_sentence: 至期果洪注城門水深一丈。
translation: On that day, a flood will pour through the city gates, and the water will be 1 foot deep.
The inhabitants were flooded and many died.
